prompts: Create a ground-type Pokemon that has sandy colors and a mischievous grin.
I want a Pokemon design with a strong body and cool sunglasses, perfect for desert environments.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies both cunning and strength, with unique brown and pink patterns.

Imagine a Pokemon that loves to bask in the sun, featuring a mix of earth tones.
Design a Pokemon with a laid-back attitude, showcasing a blend of black and tan colors.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in deserts, characterized by its unique shape and coloration.
